content: every year i look forward to gathering up all my leftover yarns from various projects and sorting them into color schemes that i can turn into scarves and shawls it s my favorite way to get a unique piece that is beautiful and reduces my yarn stash the marled triangle scarf is the first of my go-to scrap yarn projects that i wanted to share with you all you could also use advent minis held with a solid main color to tie them all together view the youtube video for instructions tips and more on this scrappy yarn project + media title 1 1 https //youtu be/qcdz5r4bqlk
